exercises.name: Bench Press
exercises.instructions: Lie flat on bench, grip bar slightly wider than shoulder-width. Lower bar to chest, then press up explosively.

exercises.name: Incline Bench Press
exercises.instructions: Set bench to 30-45 degree incline. Press bar from upper chest position.

exercises.name: Dumbbell Flyes
exercises.instructions: Lie on bench, arms extended with slight bend. Lower dumbbells in wide arc, then bring together.

exercises.name: Push-ups
exercises.instructions: Start in plank position, lower body until chest nearly touches floor, then push back up.

exercises.name: Cable Flyes
exercises.instructions: Stand between cable machines, pull handles together in front of chest with slight bend in arms.

exercises.name: Deadlift
exercises.instructions: Stand with feet hip-width, grip bar just outside legs. Keep back straight, lift by extending hips and knees.

exercises.name: Barbell Row
exercises.instructions: Bend at hips, keep back straight. Pull bar to lower chest/upper abdomen, squeeze shoulder blades.

exercises.name: Pull-ups
exercises.instructions: Hang from bar with overhand grip. Pull body up until chin clears bar, then lower with control.

exercises.name: Lat Pulldown
exercises.instructions: Sit at lat pulldown machine, pull bar to upper chest while leaning slightly back.

exercises.name: T-Bar Row
exercises.instructions: Straddle T-bar, pull weight to chest while keeping torso stable.

exercises.name: Seated Cable Row
exercises.instructions: Sit at cable row machine, pull handle to lower chest, squeeze shoulder blades together.

exercises.name: Squat
exercises.instructions: Stand with feet shoulder-width, bar on upper back. Lower by bending knees and hips, keep chest up.

exercises.name: Leg Press
exercises.instructions: Sit in leg press machine, place feet on platform. Lower weight by bending knees, then press up.

exercises.name: Leg Curl
exercises.instructions: Lie face down on leg curl machine, curl heels toward glutes, then lower with control.

exercises.name: Leg Extension
exercises.instructions: Sit in leg extension machine, extend legs to lift weight, squeeze quads at top.

exercises.name: Lunges
exercises.instructions: Step forward into lunge position, lower back knee toward ground, then push back to start.

exercises.name: Romanian Deadlift
exercises.instructions: Hold bar with slight knee bend, hinge at hips, lower bar along legs, feel stretch in hamstrings.

exercises.name: Calf Raise
exercises.instructions: Stand on balls of feet, raise up onto toes, squeeze calves, then lower slowly.

exercises.name: Overhead Press
exercises.instructions: Press bar from shoulder level to overhead, keep core tight, avoid arching back excessively.

exercises.name: Lateral Raise
exercises.instructions: Raise arms out to sides until parallel to floor, slight bend in elbows, lower with control.

exercises.name: Front Raise
exercises.instructions: Raise weight(s) in front of body to shoulder height, lower slowly.

exercises.name: Rear Delt Fly
exercises.instructions: Bend forward slightly, raise arms out to sides, focus on rear deltoids.

exercises.name: Shoulder Press Machine
exercises.instructions: Sit at shoulder press machine, press handles overhead, lower with control.

exercises.name: Bicep Curl
exercises.instructions: Curl weight from extended arm position to shoulder, squeeze biceps, lower slowly.

exercises.name: Hammer Curl
exercises.instructions: Curl dumbbells with neutral grip (palms facing each other), targets brachialis.

exercises.name: Tricep Dip
exercises.instructions: Lower body by bending arms, keep elbows close to body, push back up.

exercises.name: Tricep Pushdown
exercises.instructions: Push cable handle down, extend arms fully, squeeze triceps, return slowly.

exercises.name: Close Grip Bench Press
exercises.instructions: Bench press with hands closer than shoulder-width, focuses on triceps.

exercises.name: Preacher Curl
exercises.instructions: Curl weight on preacher bench, isolates biceps, prevents swinging.

exercises.name: Cable Curl
exercises.instructions: Curl cable handle, provides constant tension throughout movement.

exercises.name: Overhead Tricep Extension
exercises.instructions: Extend weight overhead, lower behind head by bending elbows, then extend.

exercises.name: Plank
exercises.instructions: Hold body in straight line, support on forearms and toes, engage core.

exercises.name: Crunches
exercises.instructions: Lie on back, lift shoulders toward knees, crunch abs, lower with control.

exercises.name: Russian Twist
exercises.instructions: Sit with knees bent, lean back slightly, rotate torso side to side.

exercises.name: Leg Raise
exercises.instructions: Lie on back, raise legs to vertical, lower with control, keep lower back pressed down.

exercises.name: Mountain Climbers
exercises.instructions: Start in plank, alternate bringing knees to chest in running motion.

exercises.name: Ab Wheel Rollout
exercises.instructions: Kneel, roll ab wheel forward while keeping core tight, roll back to start.

exercises.name: Decline Bench Press
exercises.instructions: Press bar on decline bench, targets lower chest.

exercises.name: Chest Dips
exercises.instructions: Dip with forward lean, targets chest and triceps.

exercises.name: Pike Push-up
exercises.instructions: Push-up in pike position, targets shoulders.

exercises.name: Face Pull
exercises.instructions: Pull cable to face level, external rotation, targets rear delts and upper back.

exercises.name: Barbell Shrug
exercises.instructions: Lift shoulders up toward ears, hold briefly, lower slowly.

exercises.name: Good Morning
exercises.instructions: Bend forward at hips with bar on back, targets hamstrings and lower back.

exercises.name: Bulgarian Split Squat
exercises.instructions: Rear foot elevated, lunge down, targets quads and glutes.

exercises.name: Hip Thrust
exercises.instructions: Thrust hips up with weight on hips, targets glutes.

exercises.name: Goblet Squat
exercises.instructions: Hold weight at chest, squat down, targets quads and core.

exercises.name: Farmer Walk
exercises.instructions: Walk while carrying heavy weights, targets grip and core stability.

exercises.name: Kettlebell Swing
exercises.instructions: Swing kettlebell from between legs to chest height, hip drive movement.

exercises.name: Bent Over Row
exercises.instructions: Bend at hips, row weight to lower chest, squeeze shoulder blades.

exercises.name: Arnold Press
exercises.instructions: Start with palms facing you, rotate and press overhead, targets all deltoid heads.

exercises.name: Upright Row
exercises.instructions: Pull weight up along body to chest level, targets shoulders and traps.

exercises.name: Reverse Fly
exercises.instructions: Bend forward, raise arms out to sides, targets rear delts and rhomboids.

exercises.name: Cable Crossover
exercises.instructions: Pull cable handles together in front of chest, targets inner chest.

exercises.name: Incline Dumbbell Press
exercises.instructions: Press dumbbells on incline bench, targets upper chest.

exercises.name: Dumbbell Pullover
exercises.instructions: Lower dumbbell behind head, pull over chest, targets chest and serratus.

exercises.name: Rack Pull
exercises.instructions: Deadlift from elevated position, allows heavier weight, targets upper back and traps.

exercises.name: Pistol Squat
exercises.instructions: Single leg squat, requires balance and mobility, advanced movement.

exercises.name: Wall Sit
exercises.instructions: Hold squat position against wall, isometric exercise for quads.

exercises.name: Side Plank
exercises.instructions: Hold body in straight line on side, support on forearm and feet, targets obliques.

exercises.name: Dead Bug
exercises.instructions: Lie on back, extend opposite arm and leg, return, targets deep core.

exercises.name: Hanging Leg Raise
exercises.instructions: Hang from bar, raise legs to parallel or higher, targets lower abs.

exercises.name: Cable Crunch
exercises.instructions: Kneel at cable machine, crunch down, provides resistance throughout movement.

exercises.name: Dumbbell Lateral Raise
exercises.instructions: Raise dumbbells out to sides, targets medial deltoids.

exercises.name: Reverse Grip Barbell Curl
exercises.instructions: Curl with overhand grip, targets brachialis and forearms.

exercises.name: 21s (Bicep Curls)
exercises.instructions: 7 reps bottom half, 7 reps top half, 7 full reps, intense bicep pump.

exercises.name: Skull Crusher
exercises.instructions: Lower weight to forehead, extend arms, targets triceps.

exercises.name: Diamond Push-up
exercises.instructions: Push-up with hands in diamond shape, targets triceps and inner chest.
